job_description: software engineering job for the role Data Analyst

• ) Prior experience maintaining High Vacuum systems.
• Maintenance, repair and solving experience with plasma RF systems and semiconductor type plasma etch tools like LAM (KIYO, EXELAN, FX, FLFX) or AMAT CENTURA, MESA, PRODUCER, ENABLER or TEL (DRM, SCCM, VIGUS, VESTA) Flexible with job responsibilities and shift assignments including night shift.
• Ability to work 12-hour shifts (3 on/4 off and 4 on/3 off) with the need to stand the entire shift and lift equipment Experience with multiple robotic systems and proficiency on operation, maintaining and repairing same.
• Experience with Training and Mentoring technicians Two-year industry related associate degree.
• Working towards a STEM related degree.
• Or equivalent military training and experience Experience: 5+ years - Semiconductor Equipment Maintenance, specifically working on vacuum systems would be a plus Less than 2 years Intern – Fab Equipment Maintenance TechnicianManassas, Virginia, United States of AmericaPosted a month ago Keeping the Lead Tech and/or Lead Engineer updated on tool and area issues.
• Basic to intermediate knowledge of AC/DC circuits including fundamentals of electricity, and basic electronic components and circuits.
• Basic understanding of physics concepts and principles.
